H0.text: Maria Fitzherbert was ‘married’ to which British monarch. King George III

H1.text: Maria Fitzherbert was ‘married’ to which British monarch. King George II

H2.text: Maria Fitzherbert was ‘married’ to which British monarch. King George I

H3.text: Maria Fitzherbert was ‘married’ to which British monarch. George IV

A4.text: George, Prince of Wales (later King George IV of the United Kingdom)

A5.text: the marriage ceremony was performed by one of the prince's Chaplains in Ordinary, the Reverend Robert Burt
